title: Friendship Hill National Historic Site: Bookstore
body: Bookstore         The bookstore at Friendship Hill is in the Gallatin House visitor center.   The bookstore at Friendship Hill National Historic Site is operated by Eastern National. Eastern National is a non-profit tax exempt organization recognized by the U.S. Congress to aid the National Park Service in their mission of education and service. All sales items are approved by the National Park Service. Your purchase helps support interpretation, education, and visitor service programs. Items from this and other National Parks are available at America's National Parks Bookstore.
